text: Sir Francis is to hand over to Sir Richard as from Nov. 1. The hand-over due in September, was delayed because of the Berlin crisis. Mr. Watkinson and his advisers felt the change would be unwise at a moment when attention had to be concentrated on possible need for important military operations. For this reason Sir Francis stayed on, and sacrificed his leave.
handwritten_text: Sir Francis is to hand over to Sir Richard as from Nov. 1. The hand-over due in September, was delayed because of the Berlin crisis. Mr. Watkinson and his advisers felt the change would be unwise at a moment when attention had to be concentrated on possible need for important military operations. For this reason Sir Francis stayed on, and sacrificed his leave.
